org.assertj.swing.util

Class AWTEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.util.AWTEvents

  • public final class AWTEvents
extends Object
    Utility methods related to AWT events.
    Author:
    Alex Ruiz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean wasWindowClosed(AWTEvent e)
      Indicates whether the id of the given event is equal to WindowEvent.WINDOW_CLOSED.
      static boolean wasWindowOpened(AWTEvent e)
      Indicates whether the id of the given event is equal to WindowEvent.WINDOW_OPENED.
      static boolean wasWindowShown(AWTEvent e)
      Indicates whether the id of the given event is equal to WindowEvent.COMPONENT_SHOWN and the source of the event is a Window.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • wasWindowOpened

        public static boolean wasWindowOpened(@Nonnull
                      AWTEvent e)
        Indicates whether the id of the given event is equal to WindowEvent.WINDOW_OPENED.
        Parameters:
        e - the given event.
        Returns:
        true if the id of the given event is equal to WINDOW_OPENED; false otherwise.

      • wasWindowShown

        public static boolean wasWindowShown(@Nonnull
                     AWTEvent e)
        Indicates whether the id of the given event is equal to WindowEvent.COMPONENT_SHOWN and the source of the event is a Window.
        Parameters:
        e - the given event.
        Returns:
        true if the id of the given event is equal to COMPONENT_SHOWN and the source of the event is a Window; false otherwise.

      • wasWindowClosed

        public static boolean wasWindowClosed(@Nonnull
                      AWTEvent e)
        Indicates whether the id of the given event is equal to WindowEvent.WINDOW_CLOSED.
        Parameters:
        e - the given event.
        Returns:
        true if the id of the given event is equal to WINDOW_CLOSED; false otherwise.
